channel.title: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?
channel.description: Well, I just realized that it's August 1st, and I haven't done a fucking thing that I told myself I was gonna do. How about you guys? :D

item.title: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The only thing I failed to finish this summer was my game engine (ran into performance problems that I’m still working out). Anyways, yea, the next thing on my agenda, is me and my gf are debating on having a child. There are some issues that came up from the past that may render her unable, but we are waiting for a confirmation.

Anyways, my summer list was as follows:
[ul][li]Catch up with my old friends now that I’m back in Mississippi[/li]
[li]Find a gf (this was the fastest and easiest)[/li]
[li]Buy a motorcycle (I now have 3?)[/li]
[li]Get motorcycle license[/li]
[li]Finish the API on my game engine (as mentioned, ran into performance issues, so I’ve been optimizing code)[/li]
[li]Learn more Java & C# (like i couldn’t do this any time?, I have no idea why I had this on my list)[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?

item.title: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:26, topic:407631”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=508907.msg3692175#msg3692175 date=1312193275]

[quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=508907.msg3692170#msg3692170 date=1312192730]

My goal was to be friends with a girl. I failed miserably.

Walk up to a random girl who looks a little sad and give her a flower, great way to get female friends cause they all need cheering up every now and then.
[/quote]All of the girls on my BlackBerry Messenger say shitty stuff about boys in their status.

Ugly girls usually say that because they cant get the ones they want. Hot girls say that to play hard to get.
[/quote]there’s like 3 of 'em that are hot out of like 12-15.[/quote]
Befriend all girls, from hot to “DAMN WTF IS THAT THING!”, I learned that in 6th grade and became that guy all the girls would chase. It’s so simple yet guys don’t think of it. 4 steps.

  1. Get great hair.
  2. Be friendly and listen.
  3. Stand up for all kids who are getting bullied even if you know your going to get your ass kicked.
  4. Be silly, girls love to laugh.

Read full topic

item.title: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:15, topic:407631”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=508907.msg3692064#msg3692064 date=1312181391]
Well I was suppose to try this juice diet thing where I drink just juices from a juicer for 10 days. Was really looking forward too it but then I got really sick and couldn’t keep much down.
[/quote]
Not eating is a shit way to lose weight, because you put it straight back on when you decide to start eating. Just stop having snacks especially juring the night because you cant lose that weight when you sleep. Breakfast is essential for losing weight, after all it gives you the energy to get out and lose that extra weight.

Breakfast: Cereal or something simple like toast
Lunch: A sammy, Muesli Bar and maybe a low fat Yohgurt
Dinner: Mixed veges (personally mixed veges taste a lot better than single Broccoli), and some sort of Meat.

I always have 8 cups of water per day, it’s suppose to help you lose.

EDIT:
Fizzy drinks also have a shit load of sugar in them, energy drinks are even worse.[/quote]
Oh, no I should have phrased that better. It’s not a diet to lose weight (I’m under weight), its like a detox thing, my doctor suggested it cause I’m being treated for stomach ulcers and would help build up my body’s defenses to be able to heal myself faster. The juice combinations are hearty and give me almost 5 times my daily value of almost all vitamins and fiber.

Read full topic
item.source: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?

item.title: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Well I was suppose to try this juice diet thing where I drink just juices from a juicer for 10 days. Was really looking forward too it but then I got really sick and couldn’t keep much down.

Not eating is a shit way to lose weight, because you put it straight back on when you decide to start eating. Just stop having snacks especially juring the night because you cant lose that weight when you sleep. Breakfast is essential for losing weight, after all it gives you the energy to get out and lose that extra weight.

Breakfast: Cereal or something simple like toast
Lunch: A sammy, Muesli Bar and maybe a low fat Yohgurt
Dinner: Mixed veges (personally mixed veges taste a lot better than single Broccoli), and some sort of Meat.

I always have 8 cups of water per day, it’s suppose to help you lose.

EDIT:
Fizzy drinks also have a shit load of sugar in them, energy drinks are even worse.

Read full topic
item.source: So what have you guys failed to do this summer?
